name: Watch Out (itch) (JGameDeveloper)
description:
Hello, I am JGameDev, creator of this little game. This game was originally made for Undefined Game Jam. That is what I have to say, enjoy this little game, Bye!

Controlls:

Left mouse click -> Turn on and off your lamp

Right mouse click -> shot

Important: You can shot even if your lamp doesn't work.

Goal:

Kill 100 monsters
